editor.title: Title (Optional)
editor.multiple_center_definitions_body: Both a zone entity and manual coordinates are set. The zone entity will take priority. Please remove one to avoid confusion.
editor.auto_radar_max_distance_help: Automatically adjusts the radar's maximum distance to fit the furthest entity. If disabled, you can set a fixed distance.
editor.center_coords_override_help: By default, the radar is centered on your Home Assistant's location. Use this to specify a different center point by selecting a zone entity.
editor.name: Name (Optional)
editor.color_contrast_help: For accessibility, ensure all colors have sufficient contrast against the card background.
editor.points_clickable_help: Opens the 'more-info' dialog when a point on the radar is clicked.
editor.legend_pulse_help: Clicking an entity in the legend will make its dot on the radar pulse, making it easier to locate.
editor.moving_animation_enabled_help: Adds a radar-like ping animation to entities that are currently moving (e.g., walking, driving). Requires the entity to have an 'activity' attribute.
editor.moving_animation_activities_help: List of activities that trigger the moving animation. Defaults to: Automotive, Cycling, Walking, Driving.
editor.moving_animation_attribute_help: The entity attribute to check for the activity value. Defaults to 'activity'.

card.no_home_location: Center location is not set in Home Assistant and no custom coordinates are provided.
card.multiple_center_definitions: Please provide either a zone entity or manual coordinates for the center, not both.
card.incomplete_center_coords: Please provide both Center Latitude and Center Longitude.
